sub_title: CEO Cyprus Airways, Experienced Aviation and Hospitality Executive, Interim Manager, Turnaround Specialist and Senior Management Consultant
summary:
Life is full of opportunities, specially when least expected. This has been the story of my life. 

I am an accomplished executive with expertise in the airline, e-commerce, and hospitality industries. Have a successful track record of leading start-ups and turning around organizations, with a focus on revenue generation, sales, marketing, and distribution strategies. I have experience in various industries, cultures, and countries, and am skilled in managing complex turnarounds, developing revenue models and implementing systems to improve business processes.

Throughout his career, I have held several key leadership positions and worked with notable companies in the aviation industry, including British Airways, Virgin, Centerparcs, Air Malta, Cyprus Airways, BMI, SABRE and IATA, among others. I have been involved in transforming and launching new airlines, e-commerce ventures, new energy projects, and holiday resorts, achieving positive results.

My areas of expertise include sales and marketing, distribution and pricing, change management, strategic planning, process improvement, team leadership, and revenue management. I have also been involved in many commercial aviation projects, contract negotiations, network development, and stakeholder management.

Besides his executive roles, Paul Sies has been active in various projects and consulting assignments, contributing to the success and growth of companies in different regions.

My goal is to experience life to its fullest whilst reaching the objectives set by my shareholders and clients. To see every problem as an opportunity and be the boss I always wanted to have.

My ultimate challenge....... to be a succesfull father! (running a company is easier)

What after my current position..... I have no idea, as I have never been able to plan a single career move in my life, but I am sure it will be challenging !

Specialties: Negotiation, Commercial Communication, Distribution models, Turnaround Management, Project Management, CRM, Business Development, Interim Management.

projects.title: Start up Syphax Airlines
projects.description:
Successfully managed the commercial ad ground operations stream of the start-up of Syphax Airlines in Tunisia. As acting CCO I wrote the business plan, network and revenue forecast.  Selected and implemented all relevant systems (PSS, Revenue Management, Network Development, Commercial Planning) and recruited the commercial management team.
Initiated sales, marketing, pricing, revenue management and operations in a record time of just 4 months from Business Plan to First Flight. 
Syphax Airlines was the 1st real Hybrid Airline in Africa, using LCC principals to work at lowest cost, and use multi channel / hybrid distribution to boost sales throughout the network in Africa and Europe.

projects.title: Commercial Re-organisation and optimisation Camair-Co
projects.description:
As advisor to the CEO successfully reorganised the commercial and ground operations department of Camair-Co (the new national airline of Cameroon), and increased sales by optimising the organisation, implementing a new network, sales, marketing, distribution, ground operations, revenue management and pricing strategy. 
The airline tripled its sales in a 3 month period. Next to this created a new fleet plan, and managed the feasibility study for a 777 operation.

profile_positions.description: Creating and growing Cyprus’s flag carrier to be an essential part of the economic drive of Cyprus
profile_positions.title: Chief Executive Officer

profile_positions.description:
Specialises in strategic management advice, interim management and specialised assistance in area's like business development, financial modelling, sales, marketing, pricing, revenue management, network development, branding, positioning, company culture, HR, planning, digital and product development. 

Projects and assignments: 

2021        Interim CEO Way2Go, business start  up
                          Advisor and partner E-Med Mobility

2016	Managing the re-launch of VLM airlines in Antwerp Belgium. 

2015	Assisting Liege Airport management to implement a new commercial organisation including a CRM Strategy and System. 

2014	Working with KPMG to write a business plan for the re-launch of Syphax Airlines in Tunisia, advising on the business model, network, organisation, 5-year revenue and traffic forecast and fleet acquisition.

2013	Successfully reorganised UK based Airline BMI Regional as Interim Chief Commercial Officer. 

2012	Distribution systems and strategy design, tender and negotiations for new start-up Saudi Gulf Airlines in Dammam so they could obtain the best cost position for a optimum distribution footprint. 

2012	Managed the start-up of Book2Meet.com a new revolutionary on-line corporate sales platform for a major US based Venture Capital Company in the hospitality industry. Later acquired by Expedia.

2011	Led the Commercial Turnaround of Air Austral in La Reunion where through evaluation of the revenue management strategy and implementing improvements a 20m gain in annual revenue was achieved.

2011	Coordinated the re-launch of Maastricht Airlines for the Curator of the airline. Worked as Interim Commercial Director / Co-CEO of the Netherlands youngest airline Maastricht Airlines.

2011	Coordinated and managed the start-up of Syphax Airlines in Tunisia, as acting CCO.  The project was completed in a record 5 months from business plan to first flight.

2011	Managed the reorganisation and Commercial Start up assistance of Camair-Co in Cameroon.
profile_positions.title: CEO and Senior Management Consultant

profile_positions.description: Fare Direct is a unique and innovative Ancillary Revenue Management system that allows Airlines to increase its revenue in the essential area of Ancillary Revenue performance. Offering the right price to the right person at the right time excelling the revenue opportunity and performance per customer.
profile_positions.title: Advisor and non-executive director

profile_positions.description:
Wrote and implemented the new strategic plan for a stand-alone Air Malta after the aborted take over by Alitalia. This is based on a radical change of business model from a legacy to a hybrid model. The new product model, based on an unbundled product, new fare structure, new RM strategy, new CRM strategy and system, increased productivity, an enforced sales force and aggressive sales structure are resulting in substantial better results. 

2018 a 31% growth in passengers is recorded. After a 3-year period of shrinking the network 21 new destinations have been launched in 2018. In 2018 a new sales partnership with Ryanair has been introduced and a high end buy on board concept along with a unique new service in Business Class. 

Fiscal year 17/18 showed a 1.2m euro profit for the 1st time in 18 years. Further development of the distribution footprint making the airline more accessible in the various markets it operates. Successfully launched a new brand under the Air Malta group, www.airmaltaholidays.com. 

In 2020 developed the lifeline schedule to keep the Island connected to the mainland during the Covid-19 crisis and wrote the post Covid 7year (restructuring) plan and EU submission to state aid essential for survival and future existence of the company.
profile_positions.title: Chief Commercial Officer

profile_positions.description: Assisting the new owners of VLM airlines with the relaunch of the airline. Advising and implementing the new network, sales, marketing, pricing and revenue management strategies including the commercial organization.

This to support the new commercial initiatives and develop a more data driven communication and business development process putting the client central.

volunteer_experiences.description: On a regular basis we supply funds to families in North Africa who have challenges with raising their children. This goes from funding education and healthcare to buying new clothing and donating this to give the families some relief in their challenging situations.
